dct_title_s: Delhi city tourist map / produced for the Department of Tourism, Government of India, by India Tourism Development Corporation.
dct_description_sm: "The information given in this map is corrected up to January 1979." "Based upon Survey of India map with the permission of the Surveyor General of India." Includes index to points of interest. Color illustration, text, location map, list of Government of India tourist offices, and indexed maps of "Connaught place and around," "Sansad Marg (Parliament Street) and around," and "Shahjahanabad" on verso.
dct_publisher_sm: [New Delhi, India] : India Tourism Development Corporation, 1979.
